p.d: In this latest installment of Microdose, no other than legendary snowboarder, Jamie Lynn tell his story and how he became one of the most influential action sports figures of all time. A master in the art of life, over the last 30 years Jamie has chosen to express himself primarily through snowboarding, painting, and music but it's hard to imagine him not being successful at anything he puts his mind to. He represents the golden era of snowboarding, and we are all pulled into his tractor beam. In this Microdose series, we understand why.
